title: Ads & Tracking Policy
intro: This policy explains how {{brand}} uses ads, sponsored content, and tracking technologies.

ads.title: 1. Ads
ads.text1: We may show ads or sponsored content. We aim to keep them clear and transparent:

items.labels: Ads will always be labeled as 'Sponsored' or similar.
items.thirdparties: Some ads may be delivered by trusted third-party networks.
items.controls: We try to provide controls to help you manage ad relevance.

tracking.title: 2. Tracking
tracking.text1: We use cookies and SDKs to improve the Service and measure performance.

items.prefs: Preference cookies to remember your settings.

items.ads: Advertising SDKs that may personalize ads.

tracking.note: For details about data use, see our <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>.

items.settings: Manage ad/tracking settings in your <settings>privacy settings</settings>.
items.email: You can also adjust your communication preferences by email.
items.dnt: We respect Do-Not-Track signals where technically possible.

contact.title: 4. Contact
contact.text: Questions about this policy? Contact us at {{email}}.
